channel.title: Teaching on Katrien Antonio
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Katrien Antonio

item.title: DataCamp course on Life Insurance
item.description: Introduction Prerequisites Courses I’ve Taken Getting Started in Data Science Getting Started in R R Studio Courses Machine Learning Courses SQL Databases Other Courses Wrap-Up Introduction While working as a marine biologist, I decided to switch career tracks slightly and pursue data science. I already had experience in mathematics, R programming and data visualization but filling in other knowledge gaps led me to searching the internet for the best places to learn these skills.
